next_window: Watch for a potential retest of the Pivot R1 at 147.6967, which if broken could lead to further upside towards 147.8166.
summary: Given the stable performance of the DXY and its close proximity to the Pivot R1, DXY strength moderately supports a bullish bias for USD/JPY. The absence of high-volatility U.S. events today may limit extreme fluctuations, favoring a continuation of the current uptrend.
